channel.title: Help on summoining items! Tell me the codes for each please
channel.description:
I need help to spawn the following items like
::item ???? ?
Desert boots:
Dragon chainbody:
Blue partyhat:
Dragon platelegs:
Cooking gauntlets:
Obsidian Shield:
Amulet of fury:
THANKS.

item.title: Help on summoining items! Tell me the codes for each please
item.dc:creator: @Krevil Krevil
item.description:
@Krevil wrote:

Top of screen, should say help. click. Item Id’s. Search for item. eg, Dragon Chain is 3141 (I know that by memory lol)

So type ::pickup 3141 1 and you’ll get a noted dragon chain… ::bank for bank

Read full topic
item.source: Help on summoining items! Tell me the codes for each please

item.title: Help on summoining items! Tell me the codes for each please
item.dc:creator: @Traveller59 Traveller59
item.description:
@Traveller59 wrote:

Open up the runmopar.bat or runmopar.sh etc… w\e you need to
Go down and click on help, then item codes ;

Mopar.bat -> Help -> Item Code -> Search: Dragon Chainbody
Do again with ur otha items…

Read full topic
